original_text: These are the heads of their fathers' houses, and this is the genealogy of those who went up with me from Babylonia, in the reign of Artaxerxes the king:
korean_text: 아닥사스다 왕이 왕위에 있을 때에 나와 함께 바벨론에서 올라온 족장들과 그들의 계보는 이러하니라

sentences.original_text: These are the heads of their fathers' houses
and this is the genealogy of those who went up with me from Babylonia
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이것은 나와 함께 바빌로니아에서 올라온 자들의 족보이니

sentences.original_text: in the reign of Artaxerxes the king:
